## Data simulation
```{r}
set.seed(40)
n <- 3 # individuals
m <- 5 # markers 
W <- matrix(rbinom(n=n*m, size=2, prob=0.5), nrow=n, ncol=m)
W

y <- c(10, 5, 8)
y
```


## Ridge regression
```{r}
lambda <- 0.1
diag(lambda, m)

# SNP effects
a <- solve(t(W)%*%W + diag(lambda, m)) %*% t(W)%*% y
a
```


## Scalar form 
```{r}
# marker 1
a[1,]
# marker 2
a[2,]

# marker 1
(W[,1]  %*% (y - W[,2:5] %*% matrix(a[-1,]))) / (sum(W[,1]^2) + diag(lambda,1))
# marker 2
(W[,2]  %*% (y - W[,-2] %*% matrix(a[-2,]))) / (sum(W[,2]^2) + diag(lambda,1))
```



## Marker specific shrinkage  
```{r}
# marker 1
sum(W[,1]^2) / (sum(W[,1]^2) + diag(lambda,1))

# marker 2
sum(W[,2]^2) / (sum(W[,2]^2) + diag(lambda,1)) 

# marker 3
sum(W[,3]^2) / (sum(W[,3]^2) + diag(lambda,1)) 
```
